evidence.claim: NuQuest leverages AWS for its cloud services.
The company supports HL7 and FHIR interoperability standards.
NuQuest ensures compliance with HIPAA regulations for health data.
Integration patterns mentioned include support for X12 transaction sets.
Azure services are utilized for secure data management.

icp.icp_reason: NuQuest's focus on HIPAA and X12 integration implies an ICP match for API healthcare data exchange.
matched_use_cases: data exchange between payers and providers
